text: @realDonaldTrump Why do people who work for minimum wage during covid19 make less than those on unemployment who do nothing..grocery workers are risking their lives to make 11 or $12 hours per hour and bring home about $340 for working 32 hours..THIS DOES NOT MAKE ANY SENSE🙀!!!!!!!
